attributes.name: admin
attributes.description: This permission gives you the ability to view and edit everything in your Datadog organization that does not have an explicitly defined permission. This includes billing and usage, user, key, and organization management. This permission is inclusive of all Standard access permissions.

attributes.name: standard
attributes.description: This permission gives you the ability to view and edit components in your Datadog organization that do not have explicitly defined permissions. This includes APM, Events, and other non-Account Management functionality.

attributes.name: logs_read_index_data
attributes.description: The ability to read all or some log indexes. Can be granted in a limited capacity per index from the Logs interface or APIs. If granted via the Roles interface or API the permission has global scope.

attributes.name: logs_modify_indexes
attributes.description: The ability to read and modify all indexes in your account. This includes the ability to grant the Logs Read Index Data and Logs Write Exclusion Filter permission to other roles, for some or all indexes. This permission also grants global Log Index Read and Log Exclusion Filter Write implicitly.

attributes.name: logs_live_tail
attributes.description: The ability to view the live tail feed for all log indexes, even if otherwise specifically restricted.

attributes.name: logs_write_exclusion_filters
attributes.description: The ability to add and change exclusion filters for all or some log indexes. Can be granted in a limited capacity per index to specific roles via the Logs interface or API. If granted from the Roles interface or API, the permission has global scope.

attributes.name: logs_write_pipelines
attributes.description: The ability to add and change log pipeline configurations, including the ability to grant the Logs Write Processors permission to other roles, for some or all pipelines. This permission also grants global Log Processor Write implicitly.

attributes.name: logs_write_processors
attributes.description: The ability to add and change some or all log processor configurations. Can be granted in a limited capacity per pipeline to specific roles via the Logs interface or API. If granted via the Roles interface or API the permission has global scope.

attributes.name: logs_write_archives
attributes.description: The ability to add and edit log archive locations.

attributes.name: logs_public_config_api
attributes.description: The ability to access and edit logs configurations via the API.

attributes.name: logs_generate_metrics
attributes.description: The ability to create custom metrics from logs.

attributes.name: logs_read_data
attributes.description: The ability to read log data. Can be restricted with restriction queries.

attributes.name: logs_read_archives
attributes.description: The ability to read logs archives location and use it for rehydration.

attributes.name: logs_write_historical_view
attributes.description: The capability to rehydrate logs from Archives.

attributes.name: dashboards_read
attributes.description: The ability to view dashboards.

attributes.name: dashboards_write
attributes.description: The ability to create and change dashboards.

attributes.name: dashboards_public_share
attributes.description: The ability to share dashboards externally.

attributes.name: monitors_read
attributes.description: The ability to view monitors.

attributes.name: monitors_write
attributes.description: The ability to change, mute, and delete individual monitors.

attributes.name: monitors_downtime
attributes.description: The ability to set downtimes for your organization. A user with this permission can suppress alerts from any monitor using a downtime, even if they do not have permission to edit those monitors explicitly.

attributes.name: security_monitoring_rules_read
attributes.description: The ability to read Detection rules.

attributes.name: security_monitoring_rules_write
attributes.description: The ability to create and edit Detection rules.

attributes.name: security_monitoring_signals_read
attributes.description: The ability to view Security signals.

attributes.name: user_access_invite
attributes.description: Allows users to invite other users to your organization.

attributes.name: user_access_manage
attributes.description: Grants the permission to disable users, manage user roles and SAML-to-role mappings.
